title: An Act relative to retirement savings

abstracts.abstract: Sections 20, 23 and 110 contained in the engrossed Bill making appropriations for the fiscal year 2026 (see House, No. 4240), which had been returned by Her Excellency the Governor with recommendation of amendment (for message, see Attachment B of House, No. 4250). July 4, 2025.

actions.description: Enacted as sections 20, 23 and 110 of the General Appropriation Bill, see H4240
Governor returned to the House with recommendation of amendment
For message, see H4250, Attachment B
Referred to the committee on House Bills in the Third Reading

related_entities.name: committee on House Bills in the Third Reading
